result.execSummary:
The defendant Travis T. Atkinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: Concurrent with any other sentence.

miscConds.notes: Defendant shall pay a DNA Analysis Surcharge in the amount of $200.00.

Defendant shall not engage in any acts or threats of violence or any abusive conduct directed toward Lynda Atkinson.
Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcoholic beverages or nonprescription controlled substances, or any prescription medicine for which the defendant does not have a current prescription.
Defendant shall not enter into any establishment where the primary purpose is the sale of alcoholic beverages.

Defendant shall consent to a reasonable request of a law enforcement officer, based on probable cause, to submit to a breath, blood, saliva, or urine test for purposes of determining the quantity of alcohol or drugs in defendant's breath, blood, saliva, or urine.
Defendant shall participate in any and all counseling deemed appropriate by the Division of Community Corrections.
Defendant shall abide by all other terms and conditions of probation deemed appropriate by the Division of Community Corrections.
Defendant shall undergo an AODA assessment and follow through with all recommendations thereof.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Travis T. Atkinson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

ADDRESS INFO for Travis T. Atkinson
Current: 10067 County Highway Y, Cassville, WI 53806 United States  (Effective: 10-05-2016)
Prior: PO Box 233, Cassville, WI 53806 United States

Case called at 10:24 AM.
Defendant Travis T. Atkinson in court with attorney Timothy Luke Angel.  Katherine M. Findley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Angel informs the court this matter is resolved and files plea and waiver form for the courts review.
Defendant enters a plea of "NO CONTEST".
Court questions defendant RE: plea and waiver of rights, court also questions attorney Angel RE: his clients plea and waiver of rights.
Court finds plea and waiver of rights is made  knowingly & intelligently & voluntarily
Court accepts plea and finds the defendant "GUILTY"
State moves for plea agreement.
Attorney Angel concurs with the state, and makes statement on behalf of his client.
Court grants motion of the state. Orders sentence be withheld and defendant be placed on probation for a period of 12 months with conditions.
